name: The Buggy Coder
description:
You've been making buggy code for some time now, it's time to face the consequences. You have no right to make your players suffer. Feel what you have done upon others. There is no way back now.

The Buggy Coder is an intense platformer where you have to survive the buggy code of a buggy codewriter.

FOR THE BLACKTHORNPROD GAME JAM #1  2018
